headline.seo: An Economic Plan We Can Believe In?

headline.main: Obama Shortens Manning's Term, Grants Clemency to Hundreds
headline.print_headline: Obama Shortens Manning's Term, Grants Clemency to Hundreds

docs.lead_paragraph: President Barack Obama granted clemency to Chelsea Manning on Tuesday, allowing the transgender Army intelligence officer convicted of leaking more than 700,000 U.S. documents to go free nearly three decades early.
docs.snippet: President Barack Obama granted clemency to Chelsea Manning on Tuesday, allowing the transgender Army intelligence officer convicted of leaking more than 700,000 U.S. documents to go free nearly three decades early....

headline.main: An Ode to the Stimulus Bill
headline.print_headline: An Ode to the Stimulus Bill

docs.lead_paragraph: What’s not to like about the stimulus bill? That it’s messy? My desk is messy. Everything Congress ever touches is messy.
docs.snippet: What’s not to like about the stimulus bill? That it’s messy? My desk is messy. Everything Congress ever touches is messy....

docs.lead_paragraph: No one expects the Republicans to give the new president carte blanche to pass his stimulus plan, but the opposition might want to pitch in and play a serious role at a time of national peril.
docs.snippet: No one expects the Republicans to give the new president carte blanche to pass his stimulus plan, but the opposition might want to pitch in and play a serious role at a time of national peril....

headline.main: Obama, Visiting G.O.P. Lawmakers, Is Open to Some Compromise on Stimulus
headline.print_headline: Obama, Visiting G.O.P. Lawmakers, Is Open to Some Compromise on Stimulus

byline.original: By JACKIE CALMES and CARL HULSE

docs.lead_paragraph: In a rare move, the president spent more than two hours meeting with the Republican conference in an effort to draw support for his economic stimulus plan.
docs.snippet: In a rare move, the president spent more than two hours meeting with the Republican conference in an effort to draw support for his economic stimulus plan....

docs.lead_paragraph: Tax giveaways may be good politics, but the severity of the nation’s economic situation should make the Obama team think twice.
docs.snippet: Tax giveaways may be good politics, but the severity of the nation’s economic situation should make the Obama team think twice....

headline.main: CNN's Documentary 'The End' Tracks End of Obama Presidency
headline.print_headline: CNN's Documentary 'The End' Tracks End of Obama Presidency

docs.lead_paragraph: Less than 48 hours before President Barack Obama leaves office, CNN will air an intimate tribute told through the workdays and accounts of key White House staff members.
